Text: This is the stuff of dreams and modern faerytales. Brel is fantastic!
Thanks for posting this.  I have the 1968 version on vinyl(!) still, so I'd love that on MP3 as well.
Can you post the mort shuman version? I like that version of the amsterdam song much better :)

Thanks for this upload. I used to own the original vinyls of the 1968 version but it's long since disappeared. I have fond memories of the Toronto Stage Performance. Brel's songs are just magical. I wouldn't mind hearing the original Mort Shuman version too.... Thanks again
